modName: Resplendent Armor Saturated Gold and More Color Variety for Tattered Armors
summary: Implements textures with increased saturation on the gold accents, more color options for Tattered Armor users and gives an alternate Tattered Armor plate coloring.
descriptionHtml:
This mod was made as a complement of [url=http://http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77315/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D77315%26preview%3D&pUp=1]Resplendent Armor and Greatsword[/url] by [b]sarcasticshark[/b]. It modifies the textures used for his armor to satisfy some needs I've acquired while using said armor set during a normal playthrough. The shared files here include the following options:

[list]
[*]Original Respledent and Tattered Armor textures with golden parts with increased saturation.
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/85353/?]Resplendent Armor Black and Blood Red Retexture[/url] (by [b]David Robson[/b]) work with the plate areas using gold accents with increased saturation.
[*]Alternate Tattered Plate coloring, a lighter, slightly browner tone than the original Tattered Armor and the Black&Blood retexture.
[*]Blue, White, Purple, Red (lighter Resplendent tone), Green and Black cloth+skirt options for Tattered Armor users.
[/list]Feel free to see the images for visual examples of the changes.
author: Othienka
